articles.description: Bill married wife Kristin on a whim in 1998
articles.content:
Comedian Bill Bailey became the latest celebrity to lift the famous Strictly Come Dancing glitterball trophy, winning the praise of judges and viewers alike.
 And he has been happily married to wife… [+1675 chars]
